
# Library

```{R}
library(readxl)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Data

```{R}
df_transportasi   <- read_excel("D:/File/Data Science/SuRe/Data Klastering.xlsx", sheet = "Transportasi")
df_kesehatan      <- read_excel("D:/File/Data Science/SuRe/Data Klastering.xlsx", sheet = "Kesehatan")
df_pendidikan     <- read_excel("D:/File/Data Science/SuRe/Data Klastering.xlsx", sheet = "Pendidikan")

data <- df_transportasi %>%
  left_join(df_kesehatan, by = "Provinsi") %>%
  left_join(df_pendidikan, by = "Provinsi")
```

# Visual

```{R}
top5_transportasi <- df_transportasi %>%
  arrange(desc(`Panjang Jalan (km)`)) %>%
  slice_head(n = 5)

ggplot(top5_transportasi, aes(x = reorder(`Provinsi`, `Panjang Jalan (km)`), y = `Panjang Jalan (km)`)) +
  geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +
  coord_flip() +
  labs(
    title = "Top 5 Jalan Terpanjang di Indonesia",
    x = "Provinsi",
    y = "Panjang (km)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
